entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is Alex. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return this stupid VeloBand Pulse. It's not working properly, and I'm completely fed up with it.
I understand your frustration. I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your VeloBand Pulse. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
Ugh, okay, hold on... It's jane.doe@email.com.

Thank you, one moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. I apologize again for the inconvenience. Our return policy allows for returns up to 90 days after purchase. So, that's certainly no problem.
Ninety days? Really? Because I saw something online about it only being a short window! I bought it 15 days ago, so am I still good?

Yes, absolutely. You're well within our return window. I'm happy to process that return for you right away. It definitely falls within our 90 days policy. Please understand that while this device is not a smart watch, it is considered to have similiar characteristics in returns.
Okay, great! Finally, some good news! So, what do I need to do? I just want to get this thing back to you guys ASAP.

I can certainly help with that. I'll email you a prepaid shipping label. Just repackage the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, if possible, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll issue a full refund to your original payment method.
Perfect! That sounds easy enough. How long will the refund take?

You should see the refund reflected in your account within 7-10 business days after we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse. I'm also going to make a note here that you experienced difficulties with the device so our quality team can review the issues.
Okay, that's acceptable. Thank you so much for your help! I really appreciate it. I was expecting a huge hassle.
You're very welcome! I'm glad I could resolve this for you quickly and efficiently. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
You're welcome! Have a great day!
If there is a need to escalate this further, you can always ask to speak to a manager.
